title: Need a Competitive 5v5 ranked team
body:
Title says it all, I am all about playing with other people as a team I'll do anything to prep for games or improve gameplay. I main ADC and SUPP, I can learn JG if needed, but ADC is my strongest. I get along with people very easily. I am senior in high school. I can play everyday, I can practice everyday, currently in Silver 5. I was in Bronze 5 and I was sick of being in it then I went on a carry/win spree and now trying to get out of silver but people feed and give up once they see a tilt (so personally i don't think I belong in silver). I try hard all the way throughout the games period and my CS is always higher than my opponent.


Contact me on NA Servers - Trowco is my summoner name. Thanks for reading and take it easy.

replies.body: wrong board bruh this is OCE
